title: Performance + Cache recurrent problems
content: I notice that Firefox is slower and crashes my computer more often than usual (Win 11). Sometimes it doesn't let me interact with the start bar, other times it just crashes. On the other hand, the browser cache is really annoying for a web developer. We need some partial cache clearing or another system similar to Chromium. I try to stick with Firefox since I've been using it for over 10 years, but I'm almost forced to switch to Chrome if it has so many problems. Thanks in advance.
creator: jegico93

title: Gah. Your tab just crashed. - tried all suggested solutions
content:
Greetings. Please help.

After Win11 update, Firefox started to just show "Gah. Your tab just crashed." I've uninstalled multiple times from MS Store and also direct from website. No luck. Safe mode works fine. My normal mode does not work even when all the addons, etc are disable. I'm a simple user with no customisations of the FF browser.

Tried new profiles, untick performance, etc.

I've even tried restore win11 update to an earlier date. Same result.

Other browsers work fine but I want to support Mozilla. I'm at the point of switching to another.

Crash IDs: bp-0dcff036-72ca-46e1-af89-caad20241126 26/11/2024, 3:50 pm View bp-37129959-b635-469c-aa2b-2f4910241126 26/11/2024, 3:50 pm View bp-809cab3e-8068-40bb-93b0-9e5750241126 26/11/2024, 3:50 pm View bp-e7a27777-15c9-42cd-8618-408230241126 26/11/2024, 3:50 pm View bp-f005a29a-9c8b-415a-8de1-5e0d30241126 26/11/2024, 3:50 pm View

Grateful for your help. Many thanks.
creator: hpyldnuk

title: Overschakelen tussen tabbladen
content: Hallo, ik heb een probleem bij het schakelen tussen tabbladen. Wanneer ik bvb vanaf you-tube of eender welke site waar ofwel muziek/geluid wordt afgespeeld, een interview of podcast of andere geluidsfragmenten en switch naar andere site of tabblad loopt het geluid van de site welk ik verlaat enkele fragmenten door, soms met onderbrekingen. Dit vind ik dan geweldig storend en is de reden ook waarom ik Firefox in het verleden reeds heb verwijderd van pc .. Toch weer toe gevoegd en helaas nog steeds zelfde probleem dus heeft u enige bruikbare tips, hoor ik dit graag, ik wil niet onmiddellijk over gaan tot opnieuw verwijderen ... Thx!!
creator: Novamativa

title: Assistance Needed to Recover Deleted Facebook Business Account
content:
Dear Facebook Support Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to request your assistance in recovering a Facebook business account that was accidentally deleted. The account was crucial for our business, HPIT, and we regret having lost access to it.

We have already created a new account, but we would greatly appreciate it if you could help us retrieve the previous account and its associated data. If possible, we would like to link the recovered account with our new one to ensure continuity for our business operations.

I have included the link to the deleted account below for your reference:

https://www.facebook.com hpitcorp

Your assistance in this matter would be immensely valuable to us. Please let us know if there are any steps we need to follow or additional information you require from our side to facilitate this process.

Thank you very much for your support and understanding.

Best regards,

John Ezekiel

Current Account Username: j [edited from public] @gmail.com <- access to Facebook account

Business Account

Previous Account Username: [edited from public] @hpitcorp.com

Change to: [edited from public] @hpit-inc.com
creator: johnezekiel.k

title: device input/output
content: why is there no way to select audio/video/ microphone input or output? . my headset dies all the time and i would like to change in firefox which output the audio should go into. while skullcandys headphones firmware sucks, firefox has the wherewithal to have a device settings section where i can choose which device has which input and output
creator: crookedthief115

title: Page visually blocked
content:
When navigating to msn.com/en-us, and about 5S after the page loads, the majority of the page is covered with an ad. This only happens when using an ExpressVPN Santa Monica connection (most reliable and fastest).

If I use another VPN server location the problem is not present. Additional information: - Location: Dongguan, China - Using Google Chrome does not cause a problem. - ExpressVPN have no solution or explanation at this time. The VPN app is set to block ads but this does not help - If I connect using Surfshark there is no problem. - OS is WIN10 64-bit fully updated. - Equipment is an Asus notebook. - This issue has only appeared on or about 5 Nov which is around the time Firefox updated. - I have updated manually but no luck.

I have attached a before and after shot.

Any suggestions will be much appreciated.
creator: howard_oldham

title: Firefox does not open previous tabs
content: Firefox does not open previous tabs, after closing Firefox it does not open previously closed tabs, it only opens a new tab, but when I go to Firefox View the tabs are in window 2 but I still cannot open them.
creator: scarlingz

title: Disable white flash when loading page
content:
Firefox flashes a white screen when loading a new page. This is a known issue. Is there a way to make it stop?

I see numerous people looking for answers (on mozilla, on stackoverflow, on superuser, on reddit, and on mozillazine), and I see no answers that work.

Is there a solution that works?

Does anyone know why Mozilla programs this in? (Is there a way to ask Mozilla directly?)

Firefox has been the only browser for me over the years, allowing customizations that free me from the frustrations of Chrome, Safari, et al. But why this flashbang, as kartana put it on reddit?
creator: bbcc

title: First connect w/newsmax.com,2nd,receive attached reply "Secure Connection Failed  An error occurred during a connection to www.newsmax.com.The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.
